FastFormat Class Hierarchy

This inheritance list is sorted roughly, but not completely, alphabetically:
  • auto_buffer_selector
  • c_string_sink
  • char_buffer_sink
  • fastformat_exception
    • bundle_exception
      • windows_resource_bundle::missing_resource_id_exception
    • format_parsing_exception
      • illformed_format_exception
    • mismatched_replacements_exception
      • missing_argument_exception
      • unreferenced_argument_exception
    • sink_exception
      • sink_output_exception
  • fastformat_initialiser
  • ff_FILE_sink
  • ff_format_element_t
  • ff_illformed_handler_info_t
  • ff_mismatched_handler_info_t
  • ff_string_slice_t
  • format_output_iterator
  • mismatched_arguments_scope_base
    • ignore_missing_arguments_scope
    • ignore_unreferenced_arguments_scope
  • null_sink
  • openrj_bundle
  • OutputDebugString_sink
  • properties_bundle
  • shim_string_sink
  • speech_sink
  • string_array_sink
  • vectored_file_sink
  • windows_resource_bundle
  • WindowsConsole_sink
  • WindowsMessageBox_sink
  • winini_bundle
